text:
Veere, Zeelandic: "(Ter) Veere", is a municipality and village on the (former) island of Walcheren, Province of Zeeland, the Netherlands.
About 22,000 people were living in the municipality in 2017.
About 1,700 people were living in the village in 2010.
Veere has had city rights since 1355.
The town hall is in Domburg.
